amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike $750,000 for the Philadelphia Museum of Art Transportation Improvement Program in Pennsylvania.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 111-219 to strike $750,000 for the Philadelphia Museum of Art Transportation Improvement Program in Pennsylvania and reduce the overall cost of the bill by a commensurate amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 326 (Roll no. 635).
